ygData.subject: New poll for EverQuest
ygData.msgSnippet: Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the EverQuest group: Because the stinkin can t log into Everquest thing what would you do? o Download
ygData.messageBody:
Enter your vote today! A new poll has been created for the
EverQuest group:

Because the stinkin can't log into
Everquest thing what would you do?

o Download Directx 8.1
o Forget everything
o Cuss
o Curse
o Critisize Everquest
o Keep Emailing Everquest
o Make a website of this stupid thing
o Never try to play Everquest again
o Email Everquest and say you don't want to play Everquest Shawdows of Lurcin
o Email Everquest and say you don't the new patch downloading thing


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EverQuest/polls

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups
web site listed above.

Thanks!
